body: The reasoning behind this is that if I move something, I want the old instance (say a Tensor) to be freed. If it's not set to None, the Tensor will be kept around until the old instance is destructed, which might not happen for quite some time.
body_html: The reasoning behind this is that if I move something, I want the old instance (say a Tensor) to be freed. If it's not set to None, the Tensor will be kept around until the old instance is destructed, which might not happen for quite some time.
